title: Question 5 (NEW)
prompt:
Joe has his cholesterol checked by his doctor and was told it was close to 300. He began a strict diet which eliminated all dairy products. Three months later he visited the doctor and his cholesterol dropped to 240.

How does Joe’s situation relate to the idea that eliminating dairy products will result in a decrease in cholesterol?
feedback:
Joe's situation is supportive of the idea that eliminating dairy products will lead to a decrease in cholesterol.  However, it doesn't prove this situation.
The correct answer is "It supports the idea that eliminating dairy products will lead to a decrease in cholesterol, but doesn’t prove it."
